name: Retro Chess (kalp)
description:
A chess game with minimal colour.

A local two-player chess game designed to be played solely with the keyboard. All you need is a friend to sit beside you in front of the computer!

  • Upto three games can be saved locally, and resumed right where you left off.
  • There are twenty retrograde chess puzzles to be solved.
  • A user's guide is provided to guide you through the controls, mechanisms, and the puzzles.

Made with love, in C.

From the User's Guide -

The timers count upward. The ability to declare a winner on timeout is left to the mutual agreement of the players.
